nodes.text: The Kadas'sa'Nikto, also known as the green Nikto, were a subspecies of the sentient humanoid Nikto species from the planet Kintan. Like their cousins the Kajain'sa'Nikto, they had scaly skin, black eyes, and symmetrical horns. Members of the subspecies included Klaatu, an employee of the crime lord Jabba the Hutt. During the later stages of the Clone Wars, a green Nikto was part of the Jedi Order.

Because they were able to sustain and survive in harsh desert climates, they were ideal enforcers for the Hutt Clan. As the Galactic Empire's control in their sector became unbearable, some green Niktos joined the Alliance to Restore the Republic, while others simply sought liberty and justice for the galaxy, and others had more selfish motivations.
After the fall of the Empire, many green Niktos fought for control of what was left behind, although some remained loyal to Leia Organa as she sent out a call to arms against the First Order.
